TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 47, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 21}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 28, "index": 25}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 37, "index": 45}]

thought: In order to craft the red_sandstone_stairs, I need to first craft 4 chiseled_red_sandstone blocks. Each chiseled_red_sandstone block requires 2 red_sandstone_slab blocks. To make the red_sandstone_slabs, I need to craft 6 red_sandstone blocks. Each red_sandstone block requires 4 red_sand blocks. Therefore, I will first move one of the red_sand blocks from slot 21 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
